itemDisplayName: Extend existing SQL Server 2014 AlwaysOn AG for Disaster Recovery
description: This template deploys an additional SQL Server 2014 AlwaysOn AG cluster node to an existing SQL Server AlwaysOn AG cluster in a remote Azure datacenter region for Disaster Recovery.  This additonal node can be leveraged for hosting Async Replicas of databases in an existing AlwaysOn Availability Group.
summary: Deploys an additional remote SQL Server 2014 AlwaysOn AG cluster node to an existing cluster for Disaster Recovery
